yourResponsibilitiesTitle: Your responsibilities as an authorised agent welsh
yourResponsibilitiesText1: 1. You must tell us within 14 days if there is a change to the Anti-Money Laundering (AML): welsh
yourResponsibilitiesText2: 2. If we request it, you must provide more information about: welsh
recordsFilings: records of your filings with Companies House welsh
yourResponsibilitiesText3: 3. If you verify the identity of clients for Companies House, you must keep records of the identity verification checks you carry out. You must keep these for 7 years from the date you complete the checks. welsh
yourResponsibilitiesWarningText: We could suspend or stop your business from acting as an authorised agent if you do not comply with the requirements. You could also get a fine or face criminal prosecution. welsh
